metadata.dc:author: Corredera, Costanza
Navarro, Salvador
Alcántara, Manel
Mora, Laura
Serra-Aracil, Xavier
metadata.dc:description: Rectal prolapse repair techniques using laparoscopic abdominal surgery are the treatments of choice. However, in patients with increased morbidity, perineal surgical techniques are indicated. Transanal endoscopic surgery is presented as a possible alternative option in groups with increased experience in it.
metadata.dc:title: Reparación del prolapso rectal mediante cirugía endoscópica transanal.
[Rectal prolapse repair using transanal endoscopic surgery].
